content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2023 Super Bowl Packages

Our 2023 Super Bowl luxury packages are custom-crafted to make sure they are perfect for each of our guests. Our football specialists will work with you to create your ideal Super Bowl itinerary with top Phoenix area hotels including The Phoenician Scottsdale, admission to the NFL Fan Experience, your preferred tickets and hospitality in State Farm Stadium, event transfers, and more. Plus, our pre-travel concierges and on-site host team will make sure you are well looked after throughout your experience. Complete 2023 Super Bowl luxury travel packages are available from $11,365 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2023 Super Bowl in Phoenix

An experienced pro at hosting the big game, Phoenix will host the Super Bowl for the fourth time in 2023. The 2023 Super Bowl, also known as Super Bowl LVII, will be played in State Farm Stadium on February 12, 2023. Super Bowl LVII will be the 57th edition of this iconic contest. Phoenix has more than its share of blue skies and sunshine and has plenty to see and do. Super Bowl LVII is going to be one incredible celebration and the perfect sports travel experience whether you’re traveling with colleagues, friends, or the family.

Click here for more details on our travel packages to Super Bowl 2024 and beyond.
